fulltextMetadata.summary: This build script automates the compilation and setup process for a multi-language User Management System. It verifies prerequisites (Node.js, Rust, Python 3), installs dependencies, builds TypeScript components, Rust vector databases, Python environments, and React frontends. The script also runs comprehensive tests across all system components to ensure proper functionality.
